note:
InfoTaxSquare.com was formed in 2003, New York, USA to provide the business registration services online remotely. In addition to the direct customers, over 2,000 professionals use InfoTaxSquare.com for their clients and most of them are the lawyers, certified public accountants and the other professionals.
InfoTaxSquare.com has so far served to thousands of clients across the world.

The main features of the InfoTaxSquare.com contain new business establishment along with the business licenses.

name: New Business Setup
value: We provide a complete solution to register business in the USA along with the business license and promotion. Our services contain Corporation Registration, L.L.C Registration, DBA Registration, Sales Tax Permit, Move company from one state to another

name: Company Name Search
value: You have an access to check the entity name availability prior to file for the registration with the department.

name: Sales Tax Registration
value: We file sales and use tax application across the USA to start selling taxable products and services online.

name: Open a Branch office
value: We help to open a branch office or a foreign entity to start business in the other state or  USA.
